Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value. I believe it could significantly enhance your experience or productivity based on its unique features. Given its quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you for $180. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the value we place on providing our esteemed customers with top-tier solutions. I trust this investment will pay off in terms of satisfaction and utility. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $180. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $180
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
